newsitem.title: UK: POLL - Extel Survey rating of analysts by sector.
newsitem.headline: POLL - Extel Survey rating of analysts by sector.

text.p: The following are selected results of the 1997 Extel survey of investment analysts, weighted by size of funds undermanagement by respondents who voted for them.
Building & Construction Building Materials/Merch.
1.HSBC James Capel 18.25 pct 1. HSBC James Capel 20.87 percent
2. Dresdner K-B 17.30 pct 2. Dresdner K-B 18.75 percent
3. SBC Warburg 15.11 pct 3. SBC Warburg 14.77 pct
Chemicals Diversified Industrials
1. BZW 28.40 pct 1. ABN AMRO H.Go. 29.43 pct
2. Merrill Lynch 19.10 pct 2. Dresdner K-B 15.89 pct
3. HSBC James Capel 15.30 pct 3. NatWest Securities 11.51 pct
Electronic/Elec Equipment Engineering
1. NatWest Securities 27.23 pct 1. HSBC James Capel 25.35 pct
2. HSBC James Capel 16.32 pct 2. Dresdner K-B 17.53 pct
3. BZW 13.12 pct 3. SBC Warburg 13.20 pct
Engineering/Vehicles Paper, Packaging & Printing
1.HSBC James Capel 29.83 pct 1. Merrill Lynch 34.14 pct
2. Merrill Lynch 19.01 pct 2. UBS Ltd 29.41 pct
3. ABN AMRO Hoare Govett 12.23 pct 3. Panmure Gordon 8.04 pct
Textiles & Apparel Alcoholic Beverages
1. SBC Warburg 27.15 pct 1. SBC Warburg 28.47 pct
2. BZW 26.61 pct 2. Merrill Lynch 11.73 pct
3. HSBC James Capel 19.76 pct 3. HSBC James Capel 11.33 pct
Food Producers Household Goods
1. NatWest Securities 23.65 pct 1. SBC Warburg 35.92 pct
2. SBC Warburg 20.14 pct 2. UBS Ltd 18.86 pct
3. UBS Ltd 13.53 pct 3. BZW 14.84 pct
